entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
